mort.tools 1.5.0

Smooth age and period surface of rates

MSmooth.Rd

Applies a 2d moving average over age and period, by condition, sex and IMD quintile.

MSmooth(data, var_name, condition_names, smooth_n_age = 3, smooth_n_year = 3)

Arguments

data

Data table containing cause-specific mortality rates

var_name

Character - the name of the variable to be smoother

condition_names

names of the causes to include

smooth_n_age

the age range for moving average - must be odd number

smooth_n_year

the year range for moving average - must be odd number

Value

data

Observed data

data_smooth

Smoothed observed data

Details

Applied to mortality or morbidity data.

Examples


if (FALSE) {

mx_smoothed <- MSmooth(
  data = test_data,
  var_name = "mix",
  condition_names = unique(test_data$condition),
  smooth_n_age = 5,
  smooth_n_year = 5
)

}
